news.headline: Tariffs Are Confusing. What to Focus On Next.
news.summary: A lot could happen on the trade front in the next few weeks, from pressuring Russia on Ukraine to arguing the legality of the administration’s tariff policy, to a China-U.S. summit. Here are a few developments to watch.

news.headline: Shaquille O'Neal Says He'll Invest in Anything Mark Cuban Touches — 'He Could Say I Got a Toilet Tissue Brand Coming Out... I'm Doing It'
news.summary: Shaquille O'Neal is a basketball legend and, at this point, just as famous for his investments as his free throws—arguably more so. news.headline: ReelTime's RLTR Soars 54% in One Week, Outperforming Every Major AI Stock as Investors Embrace "Reel Intelligence"
news.summary: RLTR becomes top-performing AI stock of the week, surpassing tech heavyweights Microsoft (MSFT), NVIDIA (NVDA), Alphabet (GOOGL), Amazon (AMZN), Meta (META), AMD, and Palantir (PLTR), BOTHELL, WA / ACCESS Newswire / July 18, 2025 / ReelTime Media ...

news.headline: D2E Labs Appoints Wayfair Exec Karan Raturi as Chief Operating Officer to Drive Marketplace Growth of Amazon Agencies
news.summary: D2E Labs, a private equity–backed platform specializing in scaling performance-driven marketplace services, has appointed Karan Raturi as Chief Operating Officer. news.headline: A Millennial Asks, 'Anyone Else Grow Up Rich And Now Totally Isn't?' Says Being Wealthy 'Just Seemed So Much Easier Back Then'
news.summary: A millennial started an interesting conversation on Reddit recently after asking a simple but loaded question: “Anyone else grow up rich and now totally isn’t?” The post really spoke to a lot of millennials who feel like life got a lot harder than it was for their parents.
